text: Men þa leofestan, geherað, hwæt þeos boc segþ.

Mid ealdorlicnesse ælmihtiges Godes, þæs fæder & þæs sunu & þas halgan gastes, & eac swylce sancta Marian, ures Drihtenes moder, & sancte Michaelis, þæs halgan heahenglas, & sanctus Petrus, þære apostolan alder, & þæs halige Nicholaes & þæs eadigan Augustines & ealre Christes halgena.
Sin hi amansumede & geniðrode þa men, þe þas stale gefremoden & þe þærto geþwærdon & þe þær ænig dæl habbað oððe hæfdon oððe get anbidiað to habbanne.
& beon hi asyndreden fram infarelde þæra haligan gelaþunge & fram ferscipe alre Godes gecorenre.
& þærtoeacan habban hio dæl & ece sar mid Iudan, ures Drihtenes belewedan, & mid þam þe ure Drihtene cwæden: Gewit fram us, nelle we þane weg þinre ingehyde; buton hi gecerran & to dædbote cuman.
Beon hi awergode etende & drincende.
Beon hi awergode gangende & sittende.
Beon hi awergode sprecende & swigiande.
Beon hi awergode waciende & slæpende.
Beon hi awergode rowende & ridende.
Beon hi awergode hlehhende & wepende.
Beon hi awergode on huse & on æcere.
Beon hi awergode on wætere & on lande & on eallen steden.
Awergoden beon heora hæfdon & on heora recgan.
Aweregoden beon heora eagan & heora earan.
Awergode beon heara tungan & lippan.
Awergode beon heora teð & heora þrotbollan.
Awergoden beon heora sculdran & heora breost.
Awergoden beon heora fet & scancan.
Awergode beon heora þeoh & eall heora inneweard.
Ðurhwunian hi awergoden fram þæs fotes tredele oð ufewearde þæs heafdes hnolle.
Buton hi hi selfa underþæncan & to dædbote cuman.
& ealswa þeos candela beoð acwæint fram þisum andweardum leohtum, swa beon heo adwæscede heora sawla into helle.
Eall folc cweðe: soð hit si, gewurþe þæt.
